What is the concept of skill and base chance used for in tabletop role-playing games?
In tabletop role-playing games, such as Dungeons & Dragons, the concept of skill and base chance is often used.
You are a helpful assistant.

Tabletop role-playing games, such as Dungeons & Dragons, use the concept of skill and base chance.
You are a helpful assistant.
What are some key factors that affect the outcomes of actions in tabletop role-playing games?
Characters have abilities and attributes that affect the outcomes of their actions in tabletop role-playing games.

Dungeons & Dragons is an example of a tabletop role-playing game that uses the concept of skill and base chance.

What is the purpose of the concept of skill and base chance in tabletop role-playing games?
The concept of skill and base chance is used to determine the outcomes of characters' actions in tabletop role-playing games.

What other factors might affect the outcomes of actions in tabletop role-playing games?

Characters' abilities and attributes determine the outcomes of their actions in tabletop role-playing games.

Player choice and environment can also affect the outcomes of characters' actions in tabletop role-playing games.
